name: Market Frenzy (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
No, I Am Not Dead Lol.

Welcome To Market Frenzy! Here You Play As A Colored Cube Who Works At A Supermarket And Needs To Keep Track Of Incoming Supply On A Conveyor Belt And Make Sure That No Bomb Or Anything Of Sorts Manages To Slim Its Way In! Then He Must Remove It From The Conveyor Belt!

However Unfortunatlly For You That Is Not The Only Thing You Got To Deal With, Because From Some Reason Bread Loafs, Boxes And Crates Are Raining From The Sky! I Have Idea Why However I Do Not Care. But Do Not Worry! I Have Supplied You With And Invisible Gun That Shoots Upwards, So You Could Defend Of Them Boxes And Crates! (The Bread Loafs However Are Pretty Good For Stock Though So Make Sure To Catch Those!)

And Thats Basically It! You Can Find More Info By Going To The Options Menu And Clicking "How To Play" In The Game.

(Most)Of The textures Used Are From: https://ambientcg.com/

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Market-Frenzy-Source

Have Fun!!! :)
